tags: drama indrapalahuja nehabaam vikramdahiya rakeshdeewana hasnainhyderabadwala the idea behind ya rab is to show how islam has been used as a tool to propagate terrorism. the film focuses on issues where so called self proclaimed maulanas (islamic preachers) misinterpret the quran and its real meaning to breed terrorists and terrorist activity. ya rab is a genuine effort to show the right face of islam and to guide the misguided on the right path.

title: jackpot
tags: comedy thriller naseeruddinshah sunnyleone sachiinjoshi bharathniwas kaizadgustad in the near future, a 'grand lottery' has been established - the catch: kill the winner before sundown to legally claim their multi-billion dollar jackpot. when katie kim mistakenly finds herself with the winning ticket, she reluctantly joins forces with amateur lottery protection agent noel cassidy who must get her to sundown in exchange for a piece of her prize.

title: titoo mba
tags: comedy nishantdahiya pragyajaiswal vatsamit a small town stud dreams of hitting the big time and making some big money. he tries out various schemes until he hits the jackpot as a gigolo, living a sort of double life that he keeps hidden from his wife.

title: queen
tags: adventure comedy drama kanganaranaut rajkummarrao lisahaydon mishboyko vikasbahl nikki holiday, a drag queen cabaret star, tries to fill the void in her life after her plans to start a family fall apart.

title: chhota bheem and the throne of bali
tags: animation rupabhimani vivaanbhimani parignyapandyashah rajivchilaka the king of bali invites chhota bheem and his friends to attend the coronation of the state's prince. after reaching bali, bheem and his friends find that the state is captured by a witch named rangda who wants to rule the country. rangda is very powerful and has leyaks, magical creatures, as her army. she arrests the king and queen of bali, but, with the assistance of chhota bheem and his friends, the young prince of bali manages to escape. now, chhota bheem and his friends attempt to save the people of bali from rangda's black magic. meanwhile rangda causes destruction and diseases in bali with her magical power. two little indonesian village girls aci and ayu help bheem and his friends to save bali from rangda.

title: heartless
tags: drama family romance adhyayansuman arianaayam deeptinaval ompuri shekharsuman the story follows jamie, a troubled young man with a birthmark on his face, which has left him feeling isolated and fearful, hiding from the world outside. he lives in the east end of london, an area notorious for its violent hooded gangs. according to news reports, the gangs are now wearing demon masks. but, one night, jamie discovers the terrifying truth.

title: what the fish
tags: adventure comedy drama manurishichadha nareshgosain dimplekapadia deeptipujari gurmmeetsingh sudha mishra is 67 years old, divorced woman that leaves the responsibility of taking care of her house by sumit, her niece’s fiancé. the most important instruction given to sumit was to ‘feed the fish & water the plants’. his very acceptance into the family was dependent on this instruction. when she returns a month later to her vasant kunj house, everything seems to be in order till she opens the bedroom door and a woman wearing white, wailing loudly.

title: bobby jasoos
tags: comedy drama thriller vidyabalan alifazal mahimaa abhishekc samarshaikh a film that celebrates the aspiration of bobby, who wants to become the number one detective in the old city area of hyderabad.

title: ungli
tags: comedy drama thriller emraanhashmi kanganaranaut sanjaydutt randeephooda renzild'silva when a corrupt judicial system lets a drunken driver off scott-free, four gym friends become vigilantes to avenge the death of their trainer.

title: children of war
tags: drama history war farooqshaikh victorbanerjee pavanmalhotra indraneilsengupta mrityunjaydevvrat in a remote village of afghanistan, baheer, a young teenager quietly slips out of his house, determined to meet with his best friend before they are both displaced by the chaos of their world.

title: kill dil
tags: action crime drama ranveersingh alizafar parineetichopra govinda shaadali once upon a time in north india, two killers – dev and tutu - roamed free. abandoned when young and vulnerable, bhaiyaji gave them shelter and nurtured them to kill! all is normal in their lives until destiny throws free-spirited disha into the mix. what follows is a game of defiance, deception and love.

title: yaariyan
tags: drama romance himanshkohli vivekbhatnagar nicolefaria gulshangrover divyakhosla jasawar (gurdas mann) a lawyer from punjab who comes to canada to work as a lawyer, but is unable to work as a lawyer and does other jobs instead. he falls in love with bhumika chawla but he meets an accident and plots a way to get easy money along with his helping hand khanna, he later finds out that the driver he was suing was the uncle of his lover yet he continues to sue.

title: haider
tags: crime drama romance tabu shahidkapoor shraddhakapoor kaykaymenon vishalbhardwaj a young man returns to kashmir after his father's disappearance to confront his uncle - the man he suspects to have a role in his father's fate.

title: daawat-e-ishq
tags: comedy drama romance adityaroykapoor parineetichopra anupamkher habibfaisal a deliciously romantic coming together of gulrez “gullu” qadir a hyderabadi shoe-sales girl disillusioned with love because of her encounters with dowry-seeking men; and tariq “taru” haidar a lucknawi cook who can charm anybody with the aroma and flavours of his biryani and kebabs.

title: mahabharat
tags: animation action amitabhbachchan ajaydevgn vidyabalan sunnydeol amaankhan mahabharat is considered as the greatest and the longest epic in world literature it has all the possible elements that a story could have - conflict, duty, sacrifice, heroism, truth, justice, romance, adventure, fantasy and relationships - making it truly an all-encompassing fascinating saga.

title: babloo happy hai
tags: comedy drama romance sahilanand parvindabas ericafernandes preetkamal nilamadhabpanda jatin, harry and rohan head to manali for one last trip before jatin gets married. in manali, the group of friends meet natasha and are set forward on a journey of rediscovery.

title: darr @ the mall
tags: horror thriller jimmyshergill nushratbharucha arifzakaria asifbasra pawankripalani a newly constructed mall is suspected to be haunted when a few workers are mysteriously killed during its construction. vishnu, a security guard, unveils the mystery behind the mall's dark secret.

title: karle pyaar karle
tags: action romance shivdarshan hasleenkaur ahamsharma tanyamalik rajeshpandey karle pyaar karle is an adrenaline gushing, action packed, edgy love story of two rebels, kabir & preet, playing the game of life.

title: o teri
tags: comedy drama pulkitsamrat bilalamrohi sarah-janedias mandirabedi umeshbist prantabh and anand, associated with a news channel in delhi, are in search of a big scam to prove a point to their senior. a dead body accidentally lands up in their car.

title: bewakoofiyaan
tags: comedy drama romance ayushmannkhurrana sonamkapoor rishikapoor swedhasingh nupurasthana a middle-class corporate couple doesn't worry about money and living expenses until the recession drains their finances.

title: raja natwarlal
tags: drama thriller mohammedzeeshanayyub tarundudeja emraanhashmi narendrajetley kunaldeshmukh based on the story of a notorious real-life con man, this twisty bollywood thriller revolves around cunning fraudster raja natwarlal, who pulls off a series of two-bit scams in mumbai on his way to a big swindle. a small-time con man wants to get into the big leagues and take on a goliath in the world of scams.

title: mardaani
tags: action drama thriller ranimukerji tahirrajbhasin gautambabbar probirdutt pradeepsarkar a mumbai police officer's search for a missing teenage girl leads her to the depraved world of child trafficking. what follows is a cat-and-mouse game between the officer and a ruthless mafia kingpin.

title: mokssh
tags: drama musical sanjivchopra chinmaymandlekar suhassirsat sukhadayash ajitp.bhairavkar parth,a young ambitious film director struggles with his career but in his struggles lies his confidence and belief that success will surely come his way.his search for a successful path breaking film makes him team up with eric,a student of anthropology. their subject ' waari ' is a religious pilgrimage which is collectively made by millions every year in maharashtra,india.it has kept pace with modern times but has retained its core values as it did many centuries ago. through parth the viewer is taken through a soul searching journey.his struggle with his conscience and his lover lead him eventually to a state of belief. 'mokssh ' narrates a modern love story.its not only spiritual it gives direction to the youth of the modern world who is lost in greed,lust,ambition.its a realization that everyone is connected to their roots ,culture. beauty of relationships,humanity,simplicity has been depicted & high lightedthroughout the film.

title: ebn-e-batuta
tags: sci-fi omkardasmanikpuri rajeevverma devgohar satyakhare varunmiddha

title: hawaa hawaai
tags: drama family sport maheshbalraj bugsbhargava hardikbothra makranddeshpande amolegupte hawaa hawaai is a story of the triumph of the human spirit; friendship and enjoying the journey of making ones dream come true. arjun moves to the big city along with his mother and little sister. out there he discovers a hidden world of in-line skating through coach lucky, who mentors kids to become skating champions. while arjun starts nursing the dream to learn skating under lucky, his four friends get together to make this dream come true for him. in this endearing story of hope and aspirations, will arjun's dreams take flight?

title: youngistaan
tags: drama jackybhagnani nehasharma farooqshaikh bomanirani syedahmedafzal abhimanyu kaul - a young, independent, games developer, living in japan and the love of his life, anwita chauhan - a bubbly, passionate and full of life, summer intern. their happy and content life faces the test of time, when blood ties and the pressure of being born into the first family of india tears a young abhimanyu between his love for anwita and a promise made to his dying father, the prime minister of india. being a public figure, by reluctantly accepting to represent the governing party, much against his own wishes and at the cost of his private life, is a double-edged sword that abhimanyu must walk on.

title: yeh hai bakrapur
tags: comedy drama asifbasra anshumanjha yoshikaverma amitsial janakivishwanathan the film's story revolves around the family of the qureshis and their pet animal goat. circumstances result in the goat acquiring rock star status in his village and beyond.

title: the dirty relation
tags: thriller sanjaychauhan jasleenmatharu kanwaljeetmatharu kesarmatharu kesarmatharu a husband who cannot keep his wife happy, a wife who is unhappy with her husband, a guy who loves someone else's wife in spite of being engaged to a girl, the film is a story of entangled, illicit relations. these relations land all of them in trouble.

title: gang of ghosts
tags: comedy drama sharmanjoshi mahiegill asrani parambratachatterjee satishkaushik a group of ghosts reside in an old house and live in harmony despite cultural differences. however, when they learn that a builder plans to demolish the building, they band together to stop him.

title: bhoothnath returns
tags: comedy drama fantasy amitabhbachchan bomanirani parthbhalerao sanjaymishra niteshtiwari boothnath vows to redeem himself when spirits tease him, and searches for a child to terrify. he befriends akhrot, a slum kid, and helps him take on the country's most powerful politician.

title: dishkiyaoon
tags: action thriller harmanbaweja harshchhaya sunnydeol rajitkapoor sanamjitsinghtalwar dishkiyaoon is a bollywood action film produced by shilpa shetty and her husband raj kundra along with eros international. the film features sunny deol, harman baweja and debutant ayesha khanna. the film is about the mumbai underworld.2014.four songs for the film have been composed by debutant palash muchhal, who's the youngest music composer of bollywood at age of 18.

title: chal bhaag
tags: comedy deepakdobriyal keeyakhanna sanjaymishra yashpalsharma prakashsaini chal bhaag kickstarts with an mla being murdered by three shooters. the incident coincides with the arresting of munna, bunty and daler for their small time crimes.

title: khoobsurat
tags: comedy romance ashokbanthia rishabhchaddha badrulislam simranjehani shashankaghosh sanju, a con-man and petty thief, gets in the bad books of jogia seth and ends up owing him money. in order to get the money, sanju decides to pose as a member of the shastri family, so that he can gain their confidence and help himself to their wealth. but fate has something else in store for sanju.

title: karar: the deal
tags: thriller jyotirana shashiwadia tarunarora mahekchahal sabir karar the deal showcases the lives of two women intertwined by their love for a man...

title: kahin hai mera pyar
tags: drama musical romance gajendrachouhan shroffjackie sanjaykapoor soniamann maheshvaijnathdoijode every youth's imagination of love that relates the story of adam & eve, known since ages and shot very first time in the hindi language in india. natures own creation adam and eve believed to be in heaven, were incited by a python to eat a fruit. eve ate the fruit and then fed it to adam. they were forbidden to have it and on eating it were exiled from heaven. a painter, karan, who is getting blur images of a girl is trying to produce it on canvas, he writes at the bottom of all the portraits 'kahin hai mera pyar' as a sign of his belief that his love exists somewhere! a businessman buys all portraits this provokes karan's feeling and he opts to search for his love more vigorously as the story unfolds further.

title: neighbours
tags: horror hritu sunnysingh gaviechahal arbaazalikhan shyamramsay christie's admirer soon discovers an unsavoury episode in her past is the reason for the disgust she feels for him.

title: angry young man
tags: action ajaysinhrathod prachisinha rameshrout this is a fictional story of a young man who is drawn to crime as a revolt against society.

title: hate story 2
tags: drama romance thriller sushantsingh surveenchawla jaybhanushali siddharthkher vishalpandya a young photographer from mumbai uses her mind to play games with a prominent hindu rightist leader.

title: creature
tags: horror sci-fi bipashabasu imranabbas mukuldev deeprajrana vikrambhatt a crew of scientists arrives on a far, cold planet to examine archaic artifacts of unknown origin. they discover that their german enemies already have a ship there. when they seek their help after a failed landing, they only find the germans’ bodies, obviously slaughtered by one of the archaic creatures, awoken to new life. now the alien is after them.

title: samrat & co.
tags: mystery ramgopalbajaj ajaybhandari barkhabisht priyanshuchatterjee kaushikghatak a village bumpkin gets married to a highly educated urban woman. the movie narrates the differences, trials and tribulations they encounter as they spend their lives together.

title: koyelaanchal
tags: action drama kannanarunachalam vinodkhanna roopalikrishnarao sunilshetty ashutrikha koyelaanchal (coal belt of india) brings to light the explosive story of the people who have kept our precious fuel station at ransom for centuries. koyelaanchal unveils itself through saryu bhan singh (vinod khanna),an ex-owner turned mafioso of the region, who through his sheer brutality & blatant defiance of law of the land, forces the people & the authorities to acknowledge him as their 'maalik'. any protest, any voice of dissent against him is dealt with spine chilling violence of epic proportions.

title: the xpose
tags: thriller himeshreshammiya yoyohoneysingh irrfankhan zoyaafroz anantmahadevan this is a dramatic chain of events in the most glamorous ,swinging era of hindi films... the 1960s. it was a decade when film stars tasted success and carried their larger than life screen image on to real life with unbridled pomp and splendour. it was during this time that two ambitious films were made... ujwal nirmal sheetal and reena mera naam. the latter became a runaway hit while the former was struggling at the box office.

title: dekh tamasha dekh
tags: comedy satishkaushik tanviazmi vinayjain sharadponkshe ferozabbaskhan dekh tamasha dekh is a political and social satire based on a true story, it revolves around the search for the religious identity of a poor man crushed under the weight of a politician`s hoarding.

title: humpty sharma ki dulhania
tags: comedy drama romance varundhawan aliabhatt sidharthshukla ashutoshrana shashankkhaitan a girl from ambala, kavya pratap singh, is about to be married. when she visits delhi to shop for her 'dhai lakh ka ghagra'(wedding dress worth rs. 2.5 lakh), she meets humpty sharma, a carefree delhiite, and falls in love with him.

title: purani jeans
tags: drama ratiagnihotri parambaidwaan kashikachopra sammydurrani tanushrichattrjibassu purani jeans is a film based on the belief that friendship is like a pair of old jeans—the more you wear them the better it gets. the summer now unfolds more dramatically as the boys make detrimental choices—of love, sex, friendship, jealousy, heartbreaks & betrayal, finally leading to broken bonds of friendship. the film travels with siddharth as he explores equations with his past—to rebuild friendships with his four friends whom he grew up with in a small town in himachal pradesh in india. when siddharth lands in india from the us, ghosts from his youth loom up. he finally overcomes the complications and sets right all the wrongs done in his past & rediscovers bonds of friendship.i n the end siddharth goes back to new york a better man; reconciled with his past & most importantly rediscovering a happier today. he returns to new york with the belief that friendship is indeed like purani jeans, the older the better!!

title: fugly
tags: drama thriller jimmyshergill mohitmarwah kiaraadvani vijendersingh kabirsadanand the fun-filled and carefree life of four college friends comes to an abrupt end when they cross paths with a corrupt police officer.

title: citylights
tags: drama thriller rajkummarrao mallhargoenka manavkaul patralekhaa hansalmehta the photographer kikukawa is cursed. he's haunted by the ghost of a bikini beauty who keeps making stupid comments. but what does she really want to tell him? and are ghosts actually photogenic? kikukawa sets out to find out.

title: lekar hum deewana dil
tags: comedy romance armaanjain deekshaseth nikitadutta rohinihattangadi arifali set in uber cool south mumbai, we follow the lives of dinoo (armaan jain) and karishma (deeksha seth), their lifestyle and attitude... young & restless who want to live life on their own terms! they are constantly frolicking around the city and painting the town red with their friends. when their exciting lives gets jolted with the pressure karishma’s family is piling on to getting her hitched, she and her rebellious best friend, dino, realize that its they who are in fact ‘made for each other’. being the rulers of their destiny, they elope to forge a lifetime of love, fun and freedom. but they are yet to learn that life isn’t that simple. and sometimes who you love the most… can become the biggest problem. lhdd follows a year in the young and passionate lives of dino and karishma who go through friendship, disillusionment, shame, conflict and heartbreak until they realize true love. but they question is – will they make the same mistake...again??!

title: 3 am: a paranormal experience
tags: horror romance salilacharya kavindave aninditanayar rannvijaysingh vishalmahadkar the story of the movie revolves around three friends who are going to make a reality show on the existence of ghosts in the world.

title: bollywood villa
tags: thriller sonamarora arunbakshi piyushbhalodiya deepakbhatia chandersensingh this film revolves around the inexplicable murders during the shooting of a film. and as the film progresses, the story unfolds and so does the mystery.

title: pizza
tags: horror thriller akshayoberoi parvathyomanakuttan dipannitasharma arunodaysingh akshayakkineni 'pizza' is a supernatural thriller - it is the story of kunal,a pizza delivery boy who works at a small pizza joint in mumbai. the staff working at the pizza joint are his only friends and his wife nikita, is someone whom he trusts and enjoys spending time with. his life is limited to delivering pizzas across the city .kunal is a non believer in the occult - whether ghosts or the afterlife. life is a series of regular uneventful days, until one day a pizza delivery goes wrong. kunal delivers to a couple at a house and this encounter changes his life around for the worse. the experiences in the haunted house makes kunal realize there are supernatural powers in existence... and to make matters worse, when he finally escapes from the house, his wife nikita goes missing. 'pizza' is a horror film, with a twist.

title: m.a.d: mad about dance
tags: drama musical saahilprem amritmaghera salahbenlemqawanssa akileshunnitan saahilprem

title: amit sahni ki list
tags: comedy romance virdas aninditanayar natasharastogi kavishastri ajaybhuyan amit sahni is a young and quirky investment banker, who is searching for the woman of his dreams, correction- the woman of his list. after a painful break-up during his teenage days, amit has noted down all the traits that he is looking for in the perfect woman or miss right and every time he goes out on a date, he secretly checks to see if his date matches to the list.

title: ekkees toppon ki salaami
tags: comedy anupamkher nehadhupia divyendusharma manurishichadha ravindragautam two sons set out to get their father what he dreamt of all through his life the ultimate sign of respect.

title: the shaukeens
tags: comedy akshaykumar lisahaydon ratiagnihotri cyrusbroacha abhisheksharma three friends in their 60s try to do everything that they couldn't do in their younger days - before death arrives.

title: desi kattey
tags: action rajeshbakshi jaybhanushali claudiaciesla akhilkapur anandkumar desi kattey is the story of two orphans who grow up in a remote village, making country guns to earn their livelihood. the film traces their journey, as they go on to become national level shooters.desi kattey is based in a small village of the kanpur district of uttar pradesh, mungera, which is famous for its geographical location i.e. at the shore of holy river ganga and manufacturing cum production of the country made guns, this story is about two young kids pali and gyani. pali and gyani alike other orphan kids with no support system work as a labor in one of such country made gun manufacturing factory for their survival.

title: life is beautiful
tags: comedy romance manojamarnani nancybrunetta anokhidalvi parthnaik manojamarnani a touching story of an italian book seller of jewish ancestry who lives in his own little fairy tale. his creative and happy life would come to an abrupt halt when his entire family is deported to a concentration camp during world war ii. while locked up he tries to convince his son that the whole thing is just a game.

title: spark
tags: action ratiagnihotri manshabahl rajneeshduggal shubhashreeganguli v.k.singh byron and nina, a young african american couple, are driving from chicago to los angeles, where nina plans to start college, when they are forced to stop in a small, desert place just this side of a ghost town. unaccustomed to confronting racism and bigotry on the scale preserved in this rural anachronism, byron's confrontational response to slurs, epithets and threats quickly leads to a fight for survival -- and the chicago couple is alone and outnumbered.

title: jigariyaa
tags: drama deepakchadha harshvardhandeo snehadeori vineetamalik rajpurohit shaamu falls in love with raadha at first sight. as they grow close to each other, destiny takes another turn.

title: mumbai delhi mumbai
tags: comedy romance shivpandit piaabajpai satishrajwade pia, a typical “mumbai” girl, makes her first ever day trip to delhi and agrees to meet a possible match for marriage on her mother’s insistence. she lands in delhi determined to reject the guy after meeting him because after all he’s from “delhi”. however, as it turns out she loses her phone while fighting with an auto driver and meets goli kohli, a witty “delhi” boy who grudgingly agrees to help her. one thing leads to another and they end up spending the entire day together. they fight, they argue, they laugh and share a lifetime of emotions in one day. when they meet in the morning they are strangers with strong biases about mumbai & delhi, when they part in the evening, the biases have turned into affection for each other’s quirks and finally, love.

title: love u crazy girl
tags: mystery mohanjoshi shaktikapoor nitikasharma aryanvaid bhabhaniprasad

title: trip to bhangarh
tags: horror manishchoudhary suzannamukherjee poonampandey jitendrapawar five friends reunite and plan a trip to bhangarh, an apparently haunted fort in rural rajasthan - a place where even staying overnight is forbidden by law.

title: gollu aur pappu
tags: comedy virdas sandeepadhar rahulhanda dimplekapadia kabirsadanand two innocent brothers are assigned a mission by a terrorist to detonate a bomb.

title: zid
tags: thriller shradhadas mohankapoor mannara karanvirsharma rohitmalhotra anubhavsinha a journalist, who is still in love with his ex-girlfriend, becomes the obsession of his landlord's daughter.
